    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109508</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field sources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Quellen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sources de champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontes do campo magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sorgenti del campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηγές μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuentes del campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show two bar magnets placed end to end (left) and a bent current-carrying wire (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current-carrying wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen das plazierte Ende mit 
zwei Stabmagneten zum Ende (nach links) und zu einer verbogenen 
aktuell-tragenden Leitung (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent l'extrémité placée 
de deux barres aimantées à l'extrémité (à gauche) et à un fil 
actuel-portant coudé (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram a extremidade 
colocada de dois ímãs de barra à extremidade (à esquerda) e a um 
fio atual-carregando curvado (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano capo a capo 
disposto dei due magneti di barra (a sinistra) e un legare 
corrente-trasportante piegato (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν δύο τοποθετημένο 
μαγνήτες τέλος ράβδων στο τέλος (αριστερά) και ένα καμμμένο 
παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran el extremo puesto de
dos imanes de barra al extremo (a la izquierda) y a un alambre 
actual-que lleva doblado (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stabmagneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell-tragende Leitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
